bug.author: PlumedSerpent
bug.summary: Spelling mistake in "mxnet/symbol/image.py" in which "gen_image" is written to be "gen_iamge"

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/PlumedSerpent>@PlumedSerpent</denchmark-link> Thanks for pointing it out.. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yajiedesign>@yajiedesign</denchmark-link> : <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blame/master/python/mxnet/symbol/image.py#L22>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blame/master/python/mxnet/symbol/image.py#L22</denchmark-link>
Any reason for this? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mxnet-label-bot>@mxnet-label-bot</denchmark-link> [Python, Bug]

It's a pure typo, see the ndarray counterpart: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/python/mxnet/ndarray/image.py#L22>https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/blob/master/python/mxnet/ndarray/image.py#L22</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nswamy>@nswamy</denchmark-link> PR with fix was merged. Can you please close this issue? Thanks
